SELECT R.ORDER_ID , R.PAYMENT_METHOD , R.TID , S.SPACE_TITLE , RO.ROOM_TITLE , ( S.SPACE_TITLE || ' ' || RO.ROOM_TITLE) SPACE_ROOM_TITLE , RO.BED_TYPE , RO.BED_COUNT , S.SPACE_TITLE , M.MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(R.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'DL') as CHECK_IN_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.CHECK_OUT_DATE, 'DL') as CHECK_OUT_DATE , R.STAY_PERIOD , R.RESERVATION_NAME , R.PEOPLE_COUNT , R.PAYMENT_TYPE , R.PRICE , R.STATUS , R.EMAIL , R.PHONE , R.BANK_NAME , R.ACCOUNT_NAME , R.ACCOUNT_NUMBER , S.ADDRESS , S.PHONE AS SELLER_PHONE
, R.PAY_STATUS , R.PAYLOAD , TO_CHAR(R.APPROVE_DATE, 'DL') as APPROVE_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.CANCEL_DATE, 'DL') as CANCEL_DATE , RO.ORIGIN_NAME , RO.CHANGE_NAME , AA.MEMBER_NAME AS SELLER_NAME FROM RESERVATION R, SPACE S, MEMBER M, ROOM RO, ( SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, RR.ORDER_ID FROM RESERVATION RR, ROOM RORO, SPACE S, MEMBER M WHERE RR.ROOM_NO = RORO.ROOM_NO AND RORO.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ) AA WHERE R.ROOM_NO = RO.ROOM_NO AND AA.ORDER_ID = R.ORDER_ID AND RO.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND R.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
